data.name: PROVIDER
data.detailed_description:
If a ghost asks you to return something. You should return it.

  • Awaken.
  • Speak to the Dead.
  • Brave the Zones.
  • Provide for their requests.
  • A̶w̵a̸k̸e̷n̸.

Provider is an esoteric exploration and action zone-punk game. Play as a Provider, a ferryman of sorts for those caught between spaces. Explore Excluded Zones, each unstuck at a different time and populated with creatures and hazards that are not meant to be survived. Use your cunning and curiosity to find what is requested, smite the creatures that stand in your way, and make it back before you're left stranded with no heat to keep you lucid. Stone Castles razed to the ground, souls cursed by greed, creatures feasting on blood and bone alike, and beings older than creation itself await you in PROVIDER.

Explore stories from across time and space, as you set lost souls right on their path to whatever comes next, all while battling back haunting echoes from the past and strange monsters that slip through the cracks in the universal fabric.

data.short_description: Speak to the lost souls, caught between planes and lacking closure. Brave the dangerous Excluded Zones. Return victorious, with a story to tell. Provide closure and uncover the larger mystery that lurks.
data.reviews:
“[PROVIDER] is a peculiar but interesting game, with simple but fun combat and great writing. P.S. F♥CK Gary.””
Hands-Off Gaming

“Every level in this game had something surprising in it.”
Alenarobo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04.2
  • Processor: Intel i3 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: A shell script is included to use system libraries (Steam libs are out of date)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04.2
  • Processor: Intel i7 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: A shell script is included to use system libraries (Steam libs are out of date)

data.legal_notice: Please don't steal our game. We worked hard on it and we think it's pretty rad. Feel free to Stream or produce Videos about it without risk of DMCA or other interference tho, we like when people cover our stuff.

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent melee combat, discussions of colonial exploitation, ecological distress, and death
